title: Wish You Once More
description: The more you love someone, the more you hurt them...BreeMat Redmond chose his career over me. He broke my heart. I vowed never to let him back in.Until he shows up in the last place I expect him to.Old memories and feelings come back to haunt me and I can't push them away. Then Mat abandons me a second time and I'm not sure I can forgive him again.MatBree Sheridan was my first love. And I broke her heart. I hurt her with my choices and I vowed never to do it again.Except I did, and I regret every single moment.But when my family needs me, I have to come back home to look after them. If I make another wrong choice this time, I'll lose Bree forever.Wish You Once More is a second chance rockstar romance and can be read as a standalone.
author: Julie Archer
